mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gamereq (gameNumber, userNumber, userNickName, gameTitle, gameImg, gameDeveloper, gameDistributor, gamePlatform, gameSupportStatus, gameGenre, gameAgeGroup) VALUES (#{gameNumber}, #{userNumber}, #{userNickName}, #{gameTitle}, #{gameImg}, #{gameDeveloper}, #{gameDistributor}, #{gamePlatform}, #{gameSupportStatus}, #{gameGenre}, #{gameAgeGroup})
